name: Thinking With Gateways
description:
Hello all, once again! Yeeticides here!

With another break from school, I have finished a new game: Thinking with Gateways

Please give it a try on a device supporting Unity WebGL.

There is a tutorial level to teach you about controls and mechanics.

Have fun, and thanks for sticking around!

A game made by Yiğit Yıldız, or as you know, Yeeticides.
